body_html: Not sure if @aselle has more context. The test was written to mean that anything other than little endian doesn't work, but I guess if it works for you, then I am for removing the check altogether, if it also has a reasonable chance of working with middle endian.

body: Not sure if @aselle has more context. The test was written to mean that anything other than little endian doesn't work, but I guess if it works for you, then I am for removing the check altogether, if it also has a reasonable chance of working with middle endian.
